meanings.sent1: The hyperarousal of the children at the birthday party was evident in their loud laughter and constant running around.
meanings.sent2: Her hyperarousal before the big game made her feel both nervous and excited.
meanings.sent3: The hyperarousal of the puppy when it saw its favorite toy was adorable to watch.
meanings.sent4: The hyperarousal of the audience during the concert was like a wave of energy filling the room.
meanings.sent5: The hyperarousal of the students during the school assembly made it a memorable event for everyone.

meanings.definition: A state of increased physiological and psychological activity.
meanings.sent1: The hyperarousal of the patient's body was a sign of the fever taking hold.
meanings.sent2: His hyperarousal during the intense workout session showed his dedication to fitness.
meanings.sent3: The hyperarousal of the squirrel as it searched for nuts was comical to observe.
meanings.sent4: The hyperarousal of the city during rush hour was like a giant beehive of activity.
meanings.sent5: The hyperarousal of the forest at dawn created a magical atmosphere for the early hikers.
